Aristotle Dataset Extensions

The Aristotle Dataset Extensions adds additional content types for the Aristotle Metadata Registry that allow for the tracking and registration of datasets and dataset metadata.

Aristotle-DSE adds the following metadata items:

  • Datasets
  • Distributions
  • Dataset Specifications
